original_title: The Best We've Got: The Carl Erskine Story
overview: From the dirt-poor alleys of Anderson, Indiana, to a record-breaking career on a legendary team on the grandest stage in sports, Carl Erskine has lived the American dream â€” and spent a lifetime giving it to others. His life as a famed Brooklyn Dodger and human rights advocate is featured in this inspiring new documentary.
title: The Best We've Got: The Carl Erskine Story
